articles.title: Afghan President Ashraf Ghani says 'remobilisation of armed forces top priority' - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: KABUL: Afghan President Ashraf Ghani said Saturday the remobilisation of the country's armed forces was a "top priority", as Taliban fighters inched c.
articles.content: Afghan President Ashraf Ghani says 'remobilisation of armed forces top priority'

articles.title: 34-year-old Singaporean doctor dies after 8-year battle with epilepsy - AsiaOne
articles.description: After having to live with a serious epileptic condition for the past eight years, a young Singaporean doctor succumbed to the rare neurological disorder on National Day (Aug 9), leaving her grieving husband and family to cope with the loss. Prior to her death…
